UPDATE T_PM_PROJECT_BASE SET EDIT_TIME = CREATE_TIME + (SYSDATE - A.CREATE_TIME) / 2, EDIT_USER = #{USER_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATA_AUTH = #{DATA_AUTH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{DATA_AUTH,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PROJECT_ID = #{PROJECT_ID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
